data.message: Watch out or I put a moonroof in the back of your head but instead let's manga your face like a clown not so happy and doesn't make any sound 2 Prix with 9s on there hips with no clips so I pistol whip them with their own gun so they can't even run so kids don't fuk with the real artist if you try to steal my shit I will stitch your fucking lips to ya ass bitch... (trademark) from HeartLess PoeT SquirreL

replies.message: I never lie, never tell a lie, I would testify set aside my dreams I’m a king ask your girl she was on her knees with a cute face fat ass skinny waist never a waste and a nice set of thighs don't be jealous guys I'm got the real illest rhymes rolling with the sunday times... (trademark)® from HeartLess PoeT SquirreL
